= STELLOPT Compilation at NERSC = 

This page details how to compile the STELLOPT family of codes on machines at [[@http://www.nersc.gov/|NERSC]]. Note that for the BEAMS3D code you will need to compile ADAS separately.
----
**Edison**
# Load the necessary module files
{{{
module load cray-hdf5-parallel
module load cray-netcdf-hdf5parallel
module load fftw/3.3.4.0
module load cray-petsc-complex
module load slepc-complex
module load cray-tpsl
module load gsl
module load silo
}}}
# Now create a directory in which you wish to compile STELLOPT and place the STELLOPT ZIP file in that directory. Then unzip it.
# Unzip stellinstall
# Now you should be able to run the setup script and compile the STELLOPT family of codes.

** Hopper **

{{{

module load cray-hdf5-parallel
module load cray-netcdf-hdf5parallel

module load fftw/3.3.4.0

**Cori**
# Load the necessary module files (Intel is the default compiler)
{{{
module load cray-hdf5-parallel
module load cray-netcdf-hdf5parallel
module load fftw/3.3.4.5
module load cray-petsc-complex
module load slepc-complex
module load cray-tpsl
module load gsl
module load silo
}}}

# Now create a directory in which you wish to compile STELLOPT and place the STELLOPT ZIP file in that directory. Then unzip it.
# Unzip stellinstall
# Now you should be able to run the setup script and compile the STELLOPT family of codes.
